"#35c5f0" : "#2f3438")}; outline: none; &:hover { color: #35c5f0; } `; const StGlobalNav2 = styled.div` cursor: pointer; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; `; const StGlobalInputNav = styled.div` align-items: center; margin-left: 80px; `; const GlobalInput = styled.input` align-items: center; margin-right: 14px; width: 280px; height: 40px; align-items: center; line-height: 0; box-sizing: border-box; border: 1px solid #dadde0; border-radius: 4px; height: 40px; padding: 0 14px; `; const GlobalNavCart = styled.img` width: 24px; height: 24px; `; const StGlobalNavContainer = styled.div` position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; margin-right: 20px; `; const GlobalNavTag = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; `; const GlobalNav2 = styled.div` padding: 0 10px; border-left: ${(props) => (props.$noBorder ? "none" : "1px solid #c1cad0")}; `; const GlobalNavCartWrap = styled.div` align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 6px; margin-right: 5px; `; import axios from "axios"; export const instance = axios.create({ baseURL: process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL, }); // function getCookie(cookieName) { var cookieValue = null; if (document.cookie) { var array = document.cookie.split(escape(cookieName) + "="); if (array.length >= 2) { var arraySub = array[1].split(";"); cookieValue = unescape(arraySub[0]); } } return cookieValue; } //! Get Post const getPhotoLists = async () => { console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL); try { const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const response = await instance.get(`/api/posts`, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("response: ", response); console.log(response.data.map((e) => e.isScrap)); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; //! Post Bookmark const postBookMarkLists = async ({ id }) => { try { console.log("bookmarkId: ", id); const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const payload = { postId: id, }; const response = await instance.post(`/api/scrap`, payload, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("bookmarkresponse: ", response.data); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; export { getPhotoLists, postBookMarkLists}; 로그인하게 되면 글로벌바의 메뉴가 바끼었으면 좋겠어
    1 / 1

    코드를 보면 로그인 상태에 따라서 글로벌바의 메뉴를 바꾸려고 시도했지만, 로그인을 할 경우 메뉴가 변경되지 않는 것 같습니다. 로그인 상태를 추적하는 isLoggedIn 상태를 세팅하는 로직이 잘못된 것 같습니다.

    현재 handleLogin 함수에서 setIsLoggedIn(true)를 호출하고 있지만, 이는 로그인을 시도할 때 바로 isLoggedIn을 true로 세팅하게 됩니다. 실제로 로그인이 성공했는지 실패했는지에 따라 isLoggedIn의 값을 변경해야 합니다.

    로그인을 성공적으로 처리하고 나면, 서버에서 받은 응답을 사용하여 isLoggedIn을 true로 설정해야 합니다. 반대로 로그인이 실패하면 isLoggedIn는 false로 유지되어야 합니다.

    다음은 handleLogin 함수를 로그인 성공 시에만 isLoggedIn를 true로 설정하는 방법을 보여줍니다.

    jsx
    const handleLogin = async () => {
  try {
    const response = await instance.post('/api/login', { /* your login data */ });
    if (response.status === 200) {
      setIsLoggedIn(true);
      navigate("/login");
    }
  } catch (error) {
    // 로그인 실패 시 처리
    console.error('Login failed:', error);
  }
};

    위 코드는 로그인 API 호출을 해서 응답의 상태 코드가 200이면 로그인 성공으로 판단하고 isLoggedIn를 true로 설정합니다. 로그인 API 호출에서 오류가 발생하면 에러 메시지를 콘솔에 출력합니다.

    로그인 실패 시에는 추가적인 처리를 할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 사용자에게 알림 메시지를 보여주거나, 재로그인을 유도하는 등의 조치를 취할 수 있습니다.

    참고로 이 코드는 로그인 데이터를 보내는 방법을 보여주지 않습니다. 로그인 데이터를 어떻게 보내야 하는지는 서버의 API 스펙에 따라 다르므로 적절하게 수정해야 합니다.

    번역결과

    Looking at the code, I tried to change the menu of the global bar depending on the login status, but the menu doesn't seem to change when I log in. The logic for setting the isLoggedIn state, which tracks the login status, seems to be incorrect.

    We are currently calling setIsLoggedIn(true) in the handleLogin function, but this will set isLoggedIn to true right away when we try to log in. You should actually change the value of isLoggedIn depending on whether the login succeeded or failed.

    After successfully handling the login, we need to set isLoggedIn to true using the response we got from the server. Conversely, if the login fails, isLoggedIn should remain false.

    The following shows how to use the handleLogin function to set isLoggedIn to true only on successful login.

    jsx
    const handleLogin = async () => {
  try {
    const response = await instance.post('/api/login', { /* your login data */ });
    if (response.status === 200) {
      setIsLoggedIn(true);
      navigate("/login");
    }
  } catch (error) {
    // 로그인 실패 시 처리
    console.error('Login failed:', error);
  }
};

    The above code calls the login API, and if the status code of the response is 200, it determines that the login was successful and sets isLoggedIn to true. If an error occurs in the login API call, an error message is output to the console.

    In case of login failure, additional processing can be performed. For example, you can take actions such as showing a notification message to the user or prompting them to log in again.

    Note that this code does not show how to send login data. How the login data should be sent depends on the server's API specification, so you need to modify it accordingly.

    1 / 1
    mutation을 사용해서 상태를 가져올 수는 없으?
    1 / 1

    네, GraphQL의 mutation을 사용해서 서버에 변경 사항을 보낼 수 있습니다. 여기서 GraphQL mutation은 REST API에서의 POST 또는 PUT, DELETE와 비슷한 개념입니다.

    그러나 상태를 가져오는 것은 mutation이 아니라 query를 사용합니다. Query는 데이터를 읽는 데 사용하고, mutation은 데이터를 변경하는 데 사용합니다.

    상태를 가져오려면 Apollo Client 라이브러리의 useQuery 또는 useLazyQuery 훅을 사용할 수 있습니다.

    예를 들어, 로그인 상태를 가져오는 query를 작성하는 방법은 다음과 같습니다.

    jsx
    import { useQuery, gql } from '@apollo/client';

const GET_LOGIN_STATUS = gql`
  query GetLoginStatus {
    loginStatus @client
  }
`;

function GlobalNavBar() {
  const { data } = useQuery(GET_LOGIN_STATUS);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (data?.loginStatus) {
      setIsLoggedIn(true);
    } else {
      setIsLoggedIn(false);
    }
  }, [data]);

  // ... 나머지 코드
}

    위 코드에서 @client 지시자는 이 필드가 로컬 상태에서 가져와야 함을 나타냅니다.

    로그인 mutation을 작성하려면 useMutation 훅을 사용할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 다음과 같이 작성할 수 있습니다.

    jsx
    import { useMutation, gql } from '@apollo/client';

const LOGIN_MUTATION = gql`
  mutation Login($username: String!, $password: String!) {
    login(username: $username, password: $password)
  }
`;

function GlobalNavBar() {
  const [login, { data }] = useMutation(LOGIN_MUTATION);

  const handleLogin = async () => {
    const response = await login({ variables: { username: 'your-username', password: 'your-password' } });
    if (response.data.login) {
      setIsLoggedIn(true);
      navigate("/login");
    }
  };

  // ... 나머지 코드
}

    위 코드는 로그인 mutation을 실행하고, 응답을 통해 로그인 상태를 업데이트합니다. 이 때 username과 password는 실제 값을 사용해야 합니다.

    참고로 이 예제들은 Apollo Client를 사용하고 있습니다. 사용하는 클라이언트 라이브러리나 서버의 GraphQL 스키마에 따라 사용법이 다를 수 있으니, 적절히 수정해야 합니다.

    1 / 1
    ERROR in ./src/features/header/GlobalNavBar.jsx 29:29-42 export 'default' (imported as 'instance') was not found in '../../api/oha' (possible exports: getPhotoLists, instance, postBookMarkLists) import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import cart from "../../imgs/kart.png"; import logo from "../../imgs/logo.jpeg"; import styled from "styled-components"; import PostModal from "./PostModal"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { PiBellLight } from "react-icons/pi"; import instance from "../../api/oha"; import { FaBookmark } from "react-icons/fa"; const GlobalNavBar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [selected, setSelected] = useState(null); const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); const moveHome = () => { navigate("/"); }; const moveSign = () => { navigate("/account"); }; const handleLogin = async () => { try { const response = await instance.post("/api/login", {}); if (response.status === 200) { setIsLoggedIn(true); navigate("/login"); } } catch (error) { console.error("Login failed:", error); } }; return ( <StGlobalNavBar> <GlobalNavBarContainer> <ContainerInner> <StLogo> <Logo src={logo} onClick={moveHome} /> </StLogo> <StGlobalNav1> <GlobalNav1 selected={selected === "커뮤니티"} onClick={() => setSelected("커뮤니티")}> {"커뮤니티"} </GlobalNav1> <GlobalNav1 selected={selected === "쇼핑"} onClick={() => setSelected("쇼핑")}> {"쇼핑"} </GlobalNav1> <GlobalNav1 selected={selected === "이사/시공/생활"} onClick={() => setSelected("이사/시공/생활")}> {"이사/시공/생활"} </GlobalNav1> </StGlobalNav1> <StGlobalNav2> <StGlobalInputNav> <GlobalInput type='text' /> </StGlobalInputNav> {isLoggedIn ? ( <> <GlobalNavCartWrap> <GlobalNavCart src={cart} /> </GlobalNavCartWrap> <StGlobalNavContainer> <GlobalNavTag> <GlobalNav2 $noBorder onClick={handleLogin}> {"로그인"} </GlobalNav2> <GlobalNav2 onClick={moveSign}>{"회원가입"}</GlobalNav2> <GlobalNav2>{"고객센터"}</GlobalNav2> </GlobalNavTag> </StGlobalNavContainer> </> ) : ( <> <StGlobalNavContainer> <GlobalNavCartWrap> <FaBookmark size='30px' /> </GlobalNavCartWrap> <GlobalNav2> <PiBellLight size='28px' /> </GlobalNav2> <GlobalNav2> <GlobalNavCart src={cart} /> </GlobalNav2> </StGlobalNavContainer> </> )} <PostModal /> </StGlobalNav2> </ContainerInner> </GlobalNavBarContainer> </StGlobalNavBar> ); }; export default GlobalNavBar; const StGlobalNavBar = styled.div` z-index: 1102; position: fixed; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; background: #ffffff; height: 80px; padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; `; const GlobalNavBarContainer = styled.div` width: 100%; `; const ContainerInner = styled.div` display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 80%; margin: 0 auto; `; const StLogo = styled.div` cursor: pointer; position: static; `; const Logo = styled.img` margin-right: 35px; width: 74px; height: 30px; `; const StGlobalNav1 = styled.div` cursor: pointer; display: flex; margin-right: 50px; `; const GlobalNav1 = styled.div` display: inline-block; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: inline-block; margin: 0 10px; padding: 21px 5px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1; font-weight: bold; color: ${(props) => (props.selected ? "#35c5f0" : "#2f3438")}; outline: none; &:hover { color: #35c5f0; } `; const StGlobalNav2 = styled.div` cursor: pointer; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; `; const StGlobalInputNav = styled.div` align-items: center; margin-left: 80px; `; const GlobalInput = styled.input` align-items: center; margin-right: 14px; width: 280px; height: 40px; align-items: center; line-height: 0; box-sizing: border-box; border: 1px solid #dadde0; border-radius: 4px; height: 40px; padding: 0 14px; `; const GlobalNavCart = styled.img` width: 24px; height: 24px; `; const StGlobalNavContainer = styled.div` position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; margin-right: 20px; `; const GlobalNavTag = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; `; const GlobalNav2 = styled.div` padding: 0 10px; border-left: ${(props) => (props.$noBorder ? "none" : "1px solid #c1cad0")}; `; const GlobalNavCartWrap = styled.div` align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 6px; margin-right: 5px; `;
    1 / 1

    당신이 받은 에러 메시지에 따르면, instance는 ../../api/oha에서 export 되었지만, default export로는 찾을 수 없다는 내용입니다. 이는 import 구문의 형식이나 해당 파일에서의 export 방식에 문제가 있음을 나타냅니다.

    가장 먼저 확인해야 할 것은 ../../api/oha 파일입니다. 이 파일은 아마도 instance를 export하고 있을 것입니다. 이 때, export default instance; 또는 module.exports = instance;와 같이 default로 export되었는지 확인해야 합니다. 만약 그렇다면, import instance from "../../api/oha"; 구문은 정확합니다.

    하지만 에러 메시지가 나타나는 것으로 보아, instance는 default로 export되지 않고, named export로 제공되었을 가능성이 높습니다. 이 경우, import { instance } from "../../api/oha";와 같이 import해야 합니다.

    요약하면, 코드에서 문제가 발생하는 부분은 import instance from "../../api/oha";입니다. 이 부분을 import { instance } from "../../api/oha";로 변경해보세요. 그래도 문제가 해결되지 않는다면, oha 파일의 export 구문을 확인해보세요.

    번역결과

    According to the error message you received, instance was exported from ../../api/oha, but the default export could not find it. This indicates a problem with the format of the import statement or the way exports are made in that file.

    The first thing to check is the ../../api/oha file. This file probably exports instance. At this time, you should check if it is exported as default, such as export default instance; or module.exports = instance;. If so, the import instance from "../../api/oha"; syntax is correct.

    However, judging from the error message, it is highly likely that instance was not exported by default, but provided by named export. In this case, you should import it like import { instance } from "../../api/oha";.

    To recap, the problematic part of the code is import instance from "../../api/oha";. Try changing this to import { instance } from "../../api/oha"; If that doesn't work, check the export syntax in the oha file.

    1 / 1
    import axios from "axios"; const instance = axios.create({ baseURL: process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL, }); // function getCookie(cookieName) { var cookieValue = null; if (document.cookie) { var array = document.cookie.split(escape(cookieName) + "="); if (array.length >= 2) { var arraySub = array[1].split(";"); cookieValue = unescape(arraySub[0]); } } return cookieValue; } //! Get Post const getPhotoLists = async () => { console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL); try { const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const response = await instance.get(`/api/posts`, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("response: ", response); console.log(response.data.map((e) => e.isScrap)); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; //! Post Bookmark const postBookMarkLists = async ({ id }) => { try { console.log("bookmarkId: ", id); const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const payload = { postId: id, }; const response = await instance.post(`/api/scrap`, payload, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("bookmarkresponse: ", response.data); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; const logIn = async (payload) => { try { const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {}); if (response.state >= 300) { alert(response.message); return; } } catch (error) {} }; export { instance, getPhotoLists, postBookMarkLists, logIn }; 로그인을 햇을시에 쿠키에 토큰을 저장하게 하는 코드를 작성해줘
    1 / 1

    다음은 로그인 시 응답으로 받은 토큰을 쿠키에 저장하는 logIn 함수입니다:

    javascript
    const logIn = async (payload) => {
	try {
		const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {});

		if (response.status >= 300) {
			alert(response.message);
			return;
		}

		// 토큰을 쿠키에 저장
		document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.data.accessToken}; path=/;`;

	} catch (error) {
		console.error(error);
	}
};

    위 코드는 서버에서 반환되는 토큰을 accessToken이라는 이름의 쿠키에 저장합니다. path=/;는 이 쿠키가 웹사이트의 모든 경로에서 접근 가능하도록 설정하는 것입니다.

    그러나 이 코드는 서버에서 로그인 요청에 대한 응답으로 accessToken을 반환한다고 가정합니다. 실제 응답의 형태가 다르다면 적절하게 수정이 필요합니다.

    또한, 토큰을 쿠키에 저장하는 것은 보안 측면에서 민감한 작업이므로, 추가적인 보안 대책을 고려해야 합니다. 예를 들어, Secure, HttpOnly 등의 쿠키 속성을 사용하여 쿠키를 더 안전하게 만들 수 있습니다. 이는 웹사이트가 HTTPS를 사용하고 있을 때 (Secure 옵션), 그리고 JavaScript가 쿠키에 접근할 수 없게 하려는 경우 (HttpOnly 옵션)에 유용합니다.

    추가로, 서버에서 httpOnly 쿠키를 설정하여 클라이언트에서 쿠키를 직접 수정하거나 읽지 못하게 할 수도 있습니다. 이 방법은 토큰이 클라이언트 측 스크립트에 노출되는 것을 방지하여 크로스 사이트 스크립팅(XSS) 공격을 막는 데 도움이 됩니다.

    번역결과

    Here is the logIn function, which saves the token received in response upon login in a cookie:

    javascript
    const logIn = async (payload) => {
	try {
		const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {});

		if (response.status >= 300) {
			alert(response.message);
			return;
		}

		// 토큰을 쿠키에 저장
		document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.data.accessToken}; path=/;`;

	} catch (error) {
		console.error(error);
	}
};

    The code above stores the token returned by the server in a cookie named accessToken. path=/; sets this cookie to be accessible from all paths on the website.

    However, this code assumes that the server returns an accessToken in response to the login request. If the form of the actual response is different, it needs to be modified accordingly.

    Also, since storing the token in a cookie is a security-sensitive operation, additional security measures should be considered. For example, cookies can be made more secure by using cookie attributes such as Secure and HttpOnly. This is useful if your website is using HTTPS (Secure option), and you do not want JavaScript to be able to access cookies (HttpOnly option).

    Additionally, you can set an httpOnly cookie on the server to prevent clients from directly modifying or reading the cookie. This method helps prevent cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks by preventing tokens from being exposed to client-side scripts.

    1 / 1
    import axios from "axios"; const instance = axios.create({ baseURL: process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL, }); // function getCookie(cookieName) { var cookieValue = null; if (document.cookie) { var array = document.cookie.split(escape(cookieName) + "="); if (array.length >= 2) { var arraySub = array[1].split(";"); cookieValue = unescape(arraySub[0]); } } return cookieValue; } //! Get Post const getPhotoLists = async () => { console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL); try { const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const response = await instance.get(`/api/posts`, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("response: ", response); console.log(response.data.map((e) => e.isScrap)); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; //! Post Bookmark const postBookMarkLists = async ({ id }) => { try { console.log("bookmarkId: ", id); const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const payload = { postId: id, }; const response = await instance.post(`/api/scrap`, payload, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("bookmarkresponse: ", response.data); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; const logIn = async (payload) => { try { const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {}); console.log(payload); document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.data.accessToken}; path=/;`; console.log(response); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; export { instance, getPhotoLists, postBookMarkLists, logIn }; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import cart from "../../imgs/kart.png"; import logo from "../../imgs/logo.jpeg"; import styled from "styled-components"; import PostModal from "./PostModal"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { PiBellLight } from "react-icons/pi"; import { LiaBookmarkSolid } from "react-icons/lia"; import { FaBookmark } from "react-icons/fa"; const GlobalNavBar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [selected, setSelected] = useState(null); const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); const moveHome = () => { navigate("/"); }; const moveSign = () => { navigate("/account"); }; const handleLogin = () => { setIsLoggedIn(true); navigate("/login"); }; return ( <StGlobalNavBar> <GlobalNavBarContainer> <ContainerInner> <StLogo> <Logo src={logo} onClick={moveHome} /> </StLogo> <StGlobalNav1> <GlobalNav1 selected={selected === "커뮤니티"} onClick={() => setSelected("커뮤니티")}> {"커뮤니티"} </GlobalNav1> <GlobalNav1 selected={selected === "쇼핑"} onClick={() => setSelected("쇼핑")}> {"쇼핑"} </GlobalNav1> <GlobalNav1 selected={selected === "이사/시공/생활"} onClick={() => setSelected("이사/시공/생활")}> {"이사/시공/생활"} </GlobalNav1> </StGlobalNav1> <StGlobalNav2> <StGlobalInputNav> <GlobalInput type='text' /> </StGlobalInputNav> {!isLoggedIn ? ( <> <GlobalNavCartWrap> <GlobalNavCart src={cart} /> </GlobalNavCartWrap> <StGlobalNavContainer> <GlobalNavTag> <GlobalNav2 $noBorder onClick={handleLogin}> {"로그인"} </GlobalNav2> <GlobalNav2 onClick={moveSign}>{"회원가입"}</GlobalNav2> <GlobalNav2>{"고객센터"}</GlobalNav2> </GlobalNavTag> </StGlobalNavContainer> </> ) : ( <> <StGlobalNavContainer> <GlobalNavCartWrap> <FaBookmark size='30px' /> </GlobalNavCartWrap> <GlobalNav2> <PiBellLight size='28px' /> </GlobalNav2> <GlobalNav2> <GlobalNavCart src={cart} /> </GlobalNav2> </StGlobalNavContainer> </> )} <PostModal /> </StGlobalNav2> </ContainerInner> </GlobalNavBarContainer> </StGlobalNavBar> ); }; export default GlobalNavBar; const StGlobalNavBar = styled.div` z-index: 1102; position: fixed; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; background: #ffffff; height: 80px; padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; `; const GlobalNavBarContainer = styled.div` width: 100%; `; const ContainerInner = styled.div` display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 80%; margin: 0 auto; `; const StLogo = styled.div` cursor: pointer; position: static; `; const Logo = styled.img` margin-right: 35px; width: 74px; height: 30px; `; const StGlobalNav1 = styled.div` cursor: pointer; display: flex; margin-right: 50px; `; const GlobalNav1 = styled.div` display: inline-block; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: inline-block; margin: 0 10px; padding: 21px 5px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1; font-weight: bold; color: ${(props) => (props.selected ? "#35c5f0" : "#2f3438")}; outline: none; &:hover { color: #35c5f0; } `; const StGlobalNav2 = styled.div` cursor: pointer; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; `; const StGlobalInputNav = styled.div` align-items: center; margin-left: 80px; `; const GlobalInput = styled.input` align-items: center; margin-right: 14px; width: 280px; height: 40px; align-items: center; line-height: 0; box-sizing: border-box; border: 1px solid #dadde0; border-radius: 4px; height: 40px; padding: 0 14px; `; const GlobalNavCart = styled.img` width: 24px; height: 24px; `; const StGlobalNavContainer = styled.div` position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; margin-right: 20px; `; const GlobalNavTag = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; `; const GlobalNav2 = styled.div` padding: 0 10px; border-left: ${(props) => (props.$noBorder ? "none" : "1px solid #c1cad0")}; `; const GlobalNavCartWrap = styled.div` align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 6px; margin-right: 5px; `; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { styled } from "styled-components"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import axios from "axios"; import { useMutation } from "@tanstack/react-query"; import { instance } from "../api/oha"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const LogIn = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const initTextFiled = () => { setEmail(""); setPassword(""); }; // ------------------------- 리액트 쿼리로 리팩토링------------------------------- const mutation = useMutation(async (payload) => { const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload); document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.headers.auth}; path=/;`; return response.data; }); const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const logInfo = { email: email, password: password, }; mutation.mutate(logInfo); }; // ------------------------- 리액트 쿼리로 리팩토링------------------------------- const inputEmailHandler = (event) => { setEmail(event.target.value); }; const inputPasswordHandler = (event) => { setPassword(event.target.value); }; const moveHome = () => { navigate("/"); }; return ( <LoginMain> <LoginLayout> <Layout> <h2> <img src='/img/todaylogo.png' alt='로고 이미지' onClick={moveHome} style={{ marginBottom: "30px", cursor: "pointer", marginTop: "40px", width: "150px", height: "50px", }} /> </h2> <form style={{ width: "300px" }} onSubmit={handleSubmit}> {/* 로그인 인풋 */} <LoginInput name='id' autoFocus autoComplete='current-id' label='아이디' required value={email} onChange={inputEmailHandler} /> <LoginInput margin='normal' name='password' autoComplete='current-password' label='패스워드' type='Password' value={password} onChange={inputPasswordHandler} /> <LoginBtn style={{ backgroundColor: "#3F9EF2" }} variant='contained'> 로그인 </LoginBtn> <section style={{ display: "block", textAlign: "center" }}> <LoginText>비밀번호 재설정</LoginText> <LoginText>회원가입</LoginText> </section> </form> <section style={{ display: "block", textAlign: "center" }}> <LoginSns>SNS계정으로 간편 로그인/회원가입</LoginSns> <Card.Img variant='top' src='/img/facebook.png' style={{ objectFit: "cover", width: "1.3cm", height: "1.3cm", borderRadius: "50%", marginRight: "20px", }} /> <Card.Img variant='top' src='/img/kakao.png' style={{ objectFit: "cover", width: "1.3cm", height: "1.3cm", borderRadius: "50%", marginRight: "20px", }} /> <Card.Img variant='top' src='/img/naver.png' style={{ objectFit: "cover", width: "1.3cm", height: "1.3cm", borderRadius: "50%", marginRight: "20px", }} /> </section> <p style={{ marginTop: "24px", color: "rgb(194, 200, 204)", fontSize: "14px", lineHeight: "18px", cursor: "pointer", }}> 로그인에 문제가 있으신가요? </p> <LoginUnuserText>비회원 주문 조회하기</LoginUnuserText> </Layout> <LoginFooter>© bucketplace, Co., Ltd.. All Rights Reserved</LoginFooter> </LoginLayout> </LoginMain> ); }; export default LogIn; const LoginMain = styled.div` display: flex; width: 100%; -webkit-box-flex: 1; flex-grow: 1; height: 100vh; `; const LoginLayout = styled.div` width: 100%; height: 100%; letter-spacing: -0.4px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; -webkit-box-align: center; align-items: center; -webkit-box-pack: center; justify-content: center; box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; body, html { margin: 0; padding: 0; } `; const Layout = styled.div` flex: 1 0 auto; margin: 0px auto; max-width: 300px; display: flex; -webkit-box-pack: center; justify-content: center; -webkit-box-align: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 40px 0px; font-size: 15px; `; const LoginInput = styled.input` display: block; width: 100%; border: 1px solid rgb(219, 219, 219); border-radius: 0px 0px 4px 4px; line-height: 21px; resize: none; transition: box-shadow 0.2s ease 0s, background-color 0.2s ease 0s; padding: 13px 15px 14px; box-sizing: border-box; `; const LoginBtn = styled.button` margin: 20px 0px; width: 100%; padding: 15px 10px; font-size: 17px; min-height: 50px; background-color: rgb(53, 197, 240); border: none; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); user-select: none; position: relative; display: inline-flex; -webkit-box-pack: center; justify-content: center; -webkit-box-align: center; align-items: center; box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700; transition: color 0.1s ease 0s, background-color 0.1s ease 0s, border-color 0.1s ease 0s; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; `; const LoginText = styled.a` text-decoration: none; margin-right: 20px; font-weight: 500; `; const LoginSns = styled.p` margin: 35px 0px 15px; color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.33; `; const LoginUnuserText = styled.div` width: 100%; margin: 40px 0px 20px; padding-top: 20px; line-height: 1.4; border-top: 1px solid rgb(219, 219, 219); text-align: center; font-weight: 500; `; const LoginFooter = styled.footer` width: 100%; color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-size: 10px; line-height: 20px; margin: -5px 0px 25px; text-align: center; box-sizing: border-box; display: block; position: relative; bottom: 0px; right: 0px; `; 로그인에 성공하면 성공했다라고 값을 넘겨줘서 globalnav를 바꿔주고 싶어
    1 / 1

    It looks like your code is in the middle of a refactoring process, and there are some parts you haven't finished. However, I can see that you are using a mix of different technologies like React, axios, styled-components, and react-query to create a login and navigation system.

    Here's a brief summary of what your code is doing:

    1. Using axios, you've created an instance that is used to perform HTTP requests. You have also defined functions to make GET and POST requests to various endpoints.

    2. The getPhotoLists function fetches a list of posts from your server. This function uses a token from a cookie named "accessToken" for authorization.

    3. The postBookMarkLists function posts a new bookmark to your server. Like the previous function, it also uses a token from a cookie named "accessToken" for authorization.

    4. The logIn function sends a login request to your server. If successful, it sets a cookie named "accessToken" with the token received from the server.

    5. You have a GlobalNavBar component which represents a navigation bar in your React application. This navigation bar changes its appearance based on whether the user is logged in or not.

    6. You have a LogIn component which presents a form for the user to enter their email and password. When the form is submitted, it sends a login request to your server using the logIn function.

    However, it seems like the LogIn component is not yet complete. There are a few variables and components (like LoginInput, LoginBtn, LoginText, LoginSns, LoginUnuserText, Layout, and LoginFooter) that are used but not defined anywhere in your code.

    You need to define these missing components and variables before you can use this component.

    1 / 1
    왜 영어로 답하는데? 다시 한글로 답해줘
    1 / 1

    안녕하세요, 물론 한국어로 답변 드릴 수 있습니다. 어떤 질문을 도와드릴까요?

    1 / 1
    import axios from "axios"; const instance = axios.create({ baseURL: process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL, }); // function getCookie(cookieName) { var cookieValue = null; if (document.cookie) { var array = document.cookie.split(escape(cookieName) + "="); if (array.length >= 2) { var arraySub = array[1].split(";"); cookieValue = unescape(arraySub[0]); } } return cookieValue; } //! Get Post const getPhotoLists = async () => { console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL); try { const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const response = await instance.get(`/api/posts`, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("response: ", response); console.log(response.data.map((e) => e.isScrap)); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; //! Post Bookmark const postBookMarkLists = async ({ id }) => { try { console.log("bookmarkId: ", id); const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const payload = { postId: id, }; const response = await instance.post(`/api/scrap`, payload, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("bookmarkresponse: ", response.data); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; const logIn = async (payload) => { try { const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {}); console.log(payload); document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.data.accessToken}; path=/;`; console.log(response); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; export { instance, getPhotoLists, postBookMarkLists, logIn }; position: relative; bottom: 0px; right: 0px; `; 로그인에 성공하면 성공했다라고 값을 넘겨줘서 globalnav를 바꿔주고 싶어
    1 / 1

    The code you've posted is quite lengthy, so I'll try to summarize its core functionality as best as I can:

    1. API Functions: This part of the code defines functions to interact with your server:

      • getPhotoLists: Fetches a list of photo posts from your server. It uses an axios instance with a base URL of your server's URL, extracted from environment variables.
      • postBookMarkLists: This function bookmarks a post. It sends a POST request to /api/scrap with a payload containing the id of the post to be bookmarked.
      • logIn: This function logs a user in. It sends a POST request to /api/auth/login with the user's login details and sets a cookie accessToken with the token received from the server.

    2. GlobalNavBar Component: This is a top-level navigation bar component for your React application. It provides several navigation options to different parts of your app. The selected option is highlighted.

    3. LogIn Component: This component provides a form for users to log in to your application. When a user enters their email and password and submits the form, the logIn function from the first part of your code is called. If the login is successful, a cookie is set with the access token.

    In terms of improvements, you may want to consider handling errors in a user-friendly way rather than simply throwing them. It would also be beneficial to add input validation to your forms to ensure that user input is as expected before sending it to the server.

    Also, note that it is recommended to use HTTPS for any communications involving sensitive data, such as login credentials, to ensure data security.

    In your login form, there's a commented section indicating a refactor with React Query's useMutation. If you want to utilize this, you might want to consider implementing the onSuccess and onError handlers of useMutation to handle the result of the API call and give feedback to the user. React Query will provide automatic retries, caching, and many other handy features for you, but they need to be implemented in a certain way.

    Last but not least, the styled import in your LogIn component is incorrect. It should be imported from 'styled-components', not "styled-components".

    From:

    javascript
    import { styled } from "styled-components";

    To:

    javascript
    import styled from "styled-components";
    1 / 1
    import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import profile from "../../imgs/default_profile.png"; import BookMark from "./BookMark"; import BookMarkOn from "./BookMarkOn"; import { useMutation, useQuery, useQueryClient } from "@tanstack/react-query"; import { postBookMarkLists } from "../../api/oha"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const CardSmall = ({ card = [], title, subtitle, more, src }) => { // const { data: bookmarkdata } = useQuery(["bookmark"], getBookMarkLists, { // refetchOnWindowFocus: true, // staleTime: 360 * 1000, // 1분 // }); const queryClient = useQueryClient(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const mutation = useMutation(postBookMarkLists, { onMutate: ({ id, index }) => { return { index }; }, onSuccess: (bookmarkdata, variables, context) => { // console.log(context); // const newOnScrap = [...onScrap]; // newOnScrap[context.index] = !newOnScrap[context.index]; // setOnScrap(newOnScrap); // queryClient.invalidateQueries(["bookmark"]); }, }); const moveDetailButtonHandler = (id) => { console.log(id); navigate(`/detail/${id}`); }; const [onScrap, setOnScrap] = useState(Array(card.length).fill(false)); const bookMarkControlHandler = async (event, index) => { event.stopPropagation(); try { const res = await mutation.mutateAsync({ id: card[index].postId, index }); console.log(res.isScrap); const newOnScrap = [...onScrap]; newOnScrap[index] = res.scrap; setOnScrap(newOnScrap); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; useEffect(() => { console.log(card.map((item) => item.isScrap)); setOnScrap(card && card.map((item) => item.isScrap)); }, [card]); return ( <> {card && card.map((item, index) => ( <CardSmallItem key={index} onClick={() => moveDetailButtonHandler(item.postId)}> <CardInnerWrap> <CardInnerImageWrap> <CardInnerImageItem src={item.titleImage} /> <CardProfileWrap> <CardProfileContainer> <CardProfileInner> <CardProfileItem src={profile} /> </CardProfileInner> <CardProfileUserName>{item.nickname}</CardProfileUserName> </CardProfileContainer> </CardProfileWrap> <ScrapButtonWrap> <ScrapButtonContainer> <span class='css-5dnyrm' onClick={(event) => bookMarkControlHandler(event, index)}> {onScrap[index] ? <BookMark /> : <BookMarkOn />} </span> </ScrapButtonContainer> </ScrapButtonWrap> </CardInnerImageWrap> <CardInnerLink></CardInnerLink> </CardInnerWrap> </CardSmallItem> ))} </> ); }; export default CardSmall; const CardSmallItem = styled.li` list-style: none; margin: 0 20px 0 0; flex-shrink: 0; scroll-snap-align: start; width: calc((100% - 100px) / 6); /* transform: translateX(${(props) => props.$slidePx}px); transition: 0.5s ease; */ `; const CardInnerWrap = styled.div` position: relative; display: flex; width: 100%; min-width: 0; flex-flow: column; `; const CardInnerImageWrap = styled.div` overflow: hidden; position: relative; border-radius: 4px; height: 230px; justify-content: space-between; `; const CardInnerLink = styled.a` position: absolute; inset: 0; cursor: pointer; `; const CardInnerImageItem = styled.img` width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; transition: transform 0.2s ease 0s; overflow-clip-margin: content-box; overflow: clip; `; const CardProfileWrap = styled.div` position: absolute; padding: 8px; font-size: 0px; z-index: 1; left: 0px; bottom: 0px; `; const CardProfileContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-content: center; margin: 0; padding: 0; `; const CardProfileInner = styled.div` position: relative; width: 24px; height: 24px; border-radius: 100%; overflow: hidden; display: inline-block; margin-right: 4px; `; const CardProfileItem = styled.img` width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); overflow-clip-margin: content-box; overflow: clip; `; const CardProfileUserName = styled.span` overflow: hidden; display: inline-block; max-width: 100px; font-size: 12px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 700; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; `; const ScrapButtonWrap = styled.div` position: absolute; padding: 8px; font-size: 0px; z-index: 1; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; `; const ScrapButtonContainer = styled.div``; Maximum update depth exceeded. This can happen when a component calls setState inside useEffect, but useEffect either doesn't have a dependency array, or one of the dependencies changes on every render. at CardSmall (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:1409:3) at ul at O (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:295753:6) at div at O (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:295753:6) at div at O (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:295753:6) at div at O (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:295753:6) at div at O (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:295753:6) at Card (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:1122:3) at div at O (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:295753:6) at div at O (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:295753:6) at Layout (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:753:3) at Main (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:8496:71) at RenderedRoute (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:287901:5) at Routes (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:288533:5) at Router (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:288471:15) at BrowserRouter (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:286574:5) at Provider (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:284013:3) at QueryClientProvider (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:303501:3) at App
    1 / 1

    이 오류 메시지는 useState를 업데이트하는 함수(setOnScrap)가 useEffect 내부에서 반복적으로 호출되고, 이로 인해 컴포넌트가 너무 많은 리렌더링을 발생시켜서 생기는 문제를 나타냅니다. 일반적으로 이러한 현상은 의존성 배열이 없거나 의존성 배열 내의 값이 매 렌더링마다 변경되는 경우에 발생합니다.

    이 문제를 해결하려면 useEffect의 의존성 배열에 들어가는 값들이 적절한 시점에만 변경되도록 보장해야 합니다. 여기서 문제가 되는 부분은 아마도 card입니다. card가 매번 새로운 참조를 갖는 배열이라면, card의 변경이 useEffect의 무한 실행을 트리거할 수 있습니다.

    가장 간단한 해결 방법은 아래와 같이 useEffect의 의존성 배열에서 card를 제거하는 것입니다. 이렇게 하면 컴포넌트가 마운트 될 때 한 번만 실행됩니다.

    javascript
    	useEffect(() => {
		console.log(card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
		setOnScrap(card && card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
	}, []);

    하지만 이 방법은 card의 내용이 변경되어도 onScrap 상태가 업데이트되지 않는다는 문제점이 있습니다.

    따라서 좀 더 명확한 해결 방법은 card의 값이 실질적으로 변경될 때만 useEffect가 실행되도록 하는 것입니다. 이를 위해 깊은 비교를 수행하는 라이브러리를 사용하거나, card의 상태 변화를 정확하게 추적할 수 있는 다른 메커니즘을 도입하는 방법이 있습니다.

    다른 방법으로는 useMemo나 useCallback 등을 사용하여 card 배열을 생성하는 방법도 있습니다. 이렇게 하면 card 배열이 실질적으로 변경되었을 때만 새로운 배열이 생성됩니다.

    javascript
    	const card = useMemo(() => {
		// card를 생성하는 로직
	}, [dependency1, dependency2, ...]);

    이렇게 하면 useEffect에서 card를 의존성으로 사용하더라도 무한 루프에 빠지지 않을 것입니다.

    javascript
    	useEffect(() => {
		console.log(card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
		setOnScrap(card && card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
	}, [card]);

    결국에는 card 값의 변경을 적절하게 관리하는 것이 핵심입니다. card 값이 변경되는 정확한 시점과 방법을 파악하는 것이 중요합니다. 이 부분이 확실하지 않다면, 이를 파악하는 것부터 시작해 보시는 것을 추천드립니다.

    번역결과

    This error message indicates that the function that updates useState (setOnScrap) is repeatedly called inside useEffect, causing the component to re-render too many times. This usually happens when the dependencies array is missing or the values ​​in the dependencies array change with every render.

    To solve this problem, we need to ensure that the values ​​in useEffect's dependencies array change only at the right time. The problematic part here is probably card. If card is an array with a new reference each time, changing card can trigger infinite execution of useEffect.

    The simplest workaround is to remove card from useEffect's dependencies array as shown below. This will only run once when the component mounts.

    javascript
    	useEffect(() => {
		console.log(card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
		setOnScrap(card && card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
	}, []);

    However, this method has the problem that the onScrap state is not updated when the contents of card change.

    So, a more explicit solution is to have useEffect only run when the value of card actually changes. You can do this either by using a library that does deep comparisons, or by introducing some other mechanism that can accurately track changes in the state of card.

    Alternatively, you can use useMemo or useCallback to create a card array. This ensures that a new array is created only when the card array is substantially changed.

    javascript
    	const card = useMemo(() => {
		// card를 생성하는 로직
	}, [dependency1, dependency2, ...]);

    This way you won't end up in an infinite loop even if you use 'card' as a dependency in 'useEffect'.

    javascript
    	useEffect(() => {
		console.log(card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
		setOnScrap(card && card.map((item) => item.isScrap));
	}, [card]);

    In the end, properly managing changes to card values ​​is key. It's important to know exactly when and how the card value changes. If you are not sure about this, we recommend that you start by figuring it out.

    1 / 1
    import axios from "axios"; const instance = axios.create({ baseURL: process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL, }); // function getCookie(cookieName) { var cookieValue = null; if (document.cookie) { var array = document.cookie.split(escape(cookieName) + "="); if (array.length >= 2) { var arraySub = array[1].split(";"); cookieValue = unescape(arraySub[0]); } } return cookieValue; } //! Get Post const getPhotoLists = async () => { console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL); try { const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const response = await instance.get(`/api/posts`, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("response: ", response); console.log(response.data.map((e) => e.isScrap)); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; //! Post Bookmark const postBookMarkLists = async ({ id }) => { try { console.log("bookmarkId: ", id); const authorizationCookie = getCookie("accessToken"); console.log("authorization token: ", authorizationCookie); const payload = { postId: id, }; const response = await instance.post(`/api/scrap`, payload, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Accept: "*/*", Authorization: authorizationCookie, // Authorization: `${accessToken}`, }, }); console.log("bookmarkresponse: ", response.data); return response.data; } catch (error) { throw new Error(error.message); } }; //! login const logIn = async (payload) => { console.log(payload); try { const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {}); console.log(payload); document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.data.accessToken}; path=/;`; console.log(response); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; export { instance, getPhotoLists, postBookMarkLists, logIn }; 로그인을 했고 로그인 이 됬다는 메세지를 받았지만 쿠키를 확인해보니 토큰값이 언디파인드가 떠있어
    1 / 1

    사용자가 로그인을 성공적으로 완료했지만 쿠키에 토큰 값이 undefined로 나타나는 문제에 대해 질문하셨군요.

    아래와 같이 디버깅해 볼 수 있습니다.

    1. 쿠키 설정 확인: 먼저 로그인 성공 후 쿠키를 설정하는 부분의 코드를 확인해보세요. 현재 코드에서는 다음과 같이 쿠키를 설정하고 있습니다.

      javascript
      document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.data.accessToken}; path=/;`;

      이때 response.data.accessToken이 undefined가 아닌지 확인해야 합니다. 만약 undefined라면 서버에서 토큰을 제대로 보내지 않고 있는 것일 수 있습니다.

    2. 서버 응답 확인: 서버에서 제대로 토큰을 반환하는지 확인해야 합니다. 이를 위해 서버 응답을 콘솔에 출력하고, 토큰 값을 확인해보세요.

    3. 브라우저 설정 확인: 일부 브라우저 설정에서는 쿠키를 차단하도록 설정할 수 있습니다. 이 경우 쿠키가 제대로 설정되지 않을 수 있으므로, 브라우저 설정을 확인해보세요.

    4. SameSite 쿠키 설정: 최근에는 보안 이슈로 인해 쿠키의 SameSite 속성에 대한 기본값이 변경되었습니다. 만약 서버와 클라이언트가 다른 도메인에 위치하고 있다면, 이로 인해 문제가 발생할 수 있습니다. SameSite 설정에 대해 확인해보시고 필요하다면 설정을 변경해보세요.

    위 방법들을 통해 문제를 해결해보시길 바랍니다. 그래도 문제가 계속된다면 좀 더 구체적인 상황 설명을 부탁드리겠습니다.

    번역결과

    You asked about an issue where the user successfully logged in, but the token value was showing up as undefined in the cookie.

    You can try debugging as below.

    1. Check cookie settings: First, check the code for setting cookies after successful login. In my current code I am setting the cookie like this:

      javascript
      document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.data.accessToken}; path=/;`;

      At this point, you need to check that response.data.accessToken is not undefined. If undefined, the server may not be sending the token properly.

      • Check Server Response: You need to verify that the server returns the token properly. To do this, print the server response to the console and check the token value.
      • Check your browser settings: Some browser settings can be set to block cookies. Cookies may not be set properly in this case, so check your browser settings.
      • SameSite cookie settings: Recently, due to security issues, the default value for the SameSite attribute in cookies has been changed. If the server and client are located in different domains, this can cause problems. Check your SameSite settings and change them if necessary.

    Please try to solve the problem with the methods above. If the problem persists, please provide a more detailed description of the situation.

    {data: {…}, status: 200, statusText: '', headers: AxiosHeaders, config: {…}, …} config : {transitional: {…}, adapter: Array(2), transformRequest: Array(1), transformResponse: Array(1), timeout: 0, …} data : {msg: '로그인 완료.', statusCode: 200, statusMessage: 'OK'} headers : AxiosHeaders access-control-allow-credentials : "true" access-control-allow-origin : "http://localhost:3000" access-control-expose-headers : "*" auth : "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJkZGQzNDVAbmF2ZXIuY29tIiwiaWF0IjoxNjkwNDQyNjgwLCJleHAiOjE2OTA0NDYyODB9.uq7NdGkrFG0zs4dyCxtuRBgHNmtSxt2JKkqnW1QPxnc" cache-control : "no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate" connection : "keep-alive" content-length : "65" content-type : "application/json;charset=UTF-8" date : "Thu, 27 Jul 2023 07:24:39 GMT" expires : "0" keep-alive : "timeout=60" pragma : "no-cache" vary : "Origin, Access-Control-Request-Method, Access-Control-Request-Headers" x-content-type-options : "nosniff" x-frame-options : "DENY" x-xss-protection : "0" Symbol(Symbol.toStringTag) : (...) [[Prototype]] : Object request : XMLHttpRequest {onreadystatechange: null, readyState: 4, timeout: 0, withCredentials: false, upload: XMLHttpRequestUpload, …} status : 200 statusText : "" [[Prototype]] : Object 쿠키는 headers의 auth에 있는것 같아
    1 / 1

    아, 확인해 보니 서버에서 응답을 받은 후에 "auth" 헤더에 토큰이 포함되어 있는 것 같습니다.

    따라서, "auth" 헤더에서 토큰을 추출하려면 아래와 같이 수정해볼 수 있습니다:

    javascript
    const logIn = async (payload) => {
	console.log(payload);
	try {
		const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {});
		console.log(payload);
		document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.headers.auth.split(' ')[1]}; path=/;`;
		console.log(response);
	} catch (error) {
		console.error(error);
	}
};

    위 코드에서 response.headers.auth.split(' ')[1] 부분은 "auth" 헤더에서 "Bearer " 이후의 문자열, 즉 토큰을 추출합니다.

    하지만 이렇게 코드를 변경하면, "auth" 헤더가 항상 존재하고, "Bearer " 다음에 유효한 토큰이 항상 존재한다는 가정하에 동작합니다. 만약 "auth" 헤더나 토큰이 존재하지 않는 경우에 대비해서 추가적인 에러 처리를 넣는 것이 좋을 것 같습니다.

    번역결과

    Ah, I checked and it seems that the "auth" header contains the token after getting the response from the server.

    So, to extract the token from the "auth" header, you can modify it like this:

    javascript
    const logIn = async (payload) => {
	console.log(payload);
	try {
		const response = await instance.post(`/api/auth/login`, payload, {});
		console.log(payload);
		document.cookie = `accessToken=${response.headers.auth.split(' ')[1]}; path=/;`;
		console.log(response);
	} catch (error) {
		console.error(error);
	}
};

    In the code above, the response.headers.auth.split(' ')[1] part extracts the string after "Bearer ", i.e. the token, from the "auth" header.

    However, this code change assumes that the "auth" header is always present, and that a valid token is always present after "Bearer ". It would be nice to add some additional error handling in case the "auth" header or token doesn't exist.

    1 / 1
    import profile from "../../imgs/default_profile.png"; import BookMark from "./BookMark"; import BookMarkOn from "./BookMarkOn"; import { useMutation, useQuery, useQueryClient } from "@tanstack/react-query"; import { getBookMarkLists, postBookMarkLists } from "../../api/oha"; import { useState } from "react"; import { styled } from "styled-components"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const CardSmall = ({ card = [], title, subtitle, more, src }) => { const queryClient = useQueryClient(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const mutation = useMutation(postBookMarkLists, { onSuccess: (bookmarkdata) => { queryClient.invalidateQueries(["bookmark"]); }, }); const [onScrap, setOnScrap] = useState(Array(card.length).fill(false)); const bookMarkControlHandler = (index) => { const newOnScrap = [...onScrap]; newOnScrap[index] = !newOnScrap[index]; setOnScrap(newOnScrap); mutation.mutate({ id: card[index].postId }); console.log({ id: card[index].postId }); }; const moveDetailButtonHandler = (id) => { console.log(id); navigate(`/detail/${id}`); }; return ( <> {card && card.map((item, index) => ( <CardSmallItem key={index} onClick={() => moveDetailButtonHandler(item.postId)}> <CardInnerWrap> <CardInnerImageWrap> <CardInnerImageItem src={item.titleImage} /> <CardProfileWrap> <CardProfileContainer> <CardProfileInner> <CardProfileItem src={profile} /> </CardProfileInner> <CardProfileUserName>{item.nickname}</CardProfileUserName> </CardProfileContainer> </CardProfileWrap> <ScrapButtonWrap> <ScrapButtonContainer> <span class='css-5dnyrm' onClick={(event) => bookMarkControlHandler(event, index)}> {onScrap[index] ? <BookMark /> : <BookMarkOn />} </span> </ScrapButtonContainer> </ScrapButtonWrap> </CardInnerImageWrap> <CardInnerLink></CardInnerLink> </CardInnerWrap> </CardSmallItem> ))} </> ); }; export default CardSmall; const CardSmallItem = styled.li` list-style: none; margin: 0 20px 0 0; flex-shrink: 0; scroll-snap-align: start; width: calc((100% - 100px) / 6); /* transform: translateX(${(props) => props.$slidePx}px); top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); overflow-clip-margin: content-box; overflow: clip; `; const CardProfileUserName = styled.span` overflow: hidden; display: inline-block; max-width: 100px; font-size: 12px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 700; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; `; const ScrapButtonWrap = styled.div` position: absolute; padding: 8px; font-size: 0px; z-index: 1; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; `; const ScrapButtonContainer = styled.div``; 북마크가 작동이 안되 ERROR Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'postId') TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'postId') at bookMarkControlHandler (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:1428:23) at onClick (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:1483:35) at HTMLUnknownElement.callCallback (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:29014:18) at Object.invokeGuardedCallbackDev (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:29058:20) at invokeGuardedCallback (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:29115:35) at invokeGuardedCallbackAndCatchFirstError (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:29129:29) at executeDispatch (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:33273:7) at processDispatchQueueItemsInOrder (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:33299:11) at processDispatchQueue (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:33310:9) at dispatchEventsForPlugins (http://localhost:3000/static/js/bundle.js:33319:7)
    1 / 1

    북마크 기능이 작동하지 않는다는 것은, 아마 북마크 버튼을 클릭했을 때 일어나는 이벤트 핸들러가 제대로 동작하지 않는다는 것일 것입니다. 에러 메시지를 보니, 'postId' 속성을 읽을 수 없다는 에러가 발생하고 있습니다. 이는 card[index].postId 에서 card[index]가 undefined임을 나타냅니다.

    이 문제를 해결하기 위해 우선적으로 bookMarkControlHandler 함수에서 event 인자를 사용하고 있지만, 그 인자를 전달하지 않는 부분을 확인해야합니다. 또한, onClick 이벤트에서 이벤트 핸들러에 넘겨주는 인자가 맞는지 확인해야합니다.

    아래와 같이 수정해 보시는 것을 권장합니다:

    javascript
    const bookMarkControlHandler = (event, index) => {
	event.stopPropagation();  // 이벤트 버블링을 방지합니다.
	const newOnScrap = [...onScrap];
	newOnScrap[index] = !newOnScrap[index];
	setOnScrap(newOnScrap);

	mutation.mutate({ id: card[index].postId });
	console.log({ id: card[index].postId });
};

...

<span
	class='css-5dnyrm'
	onClick={(event) => bookMarkControlHandler(event, index)}>
	{onScrap[index] ? <BookMark /> : <BookMarkOn />}
</span>

    위 코드에서 event.stopPropagation() 메서드는 이벤트의 전파를 막아, 부모 요소로 이벤트가 전파되는 것을 방지합니다. 이렇게 함으로써 북마크 버튼 클릭 이벤트가 카드의 클릭 이벤트로 전파되는 것을 막을 수 있습니다.

    onClick 이벤트에서 bookMarkControlHandler 함수에 event와 index를 인자로 전달하였습니다. 이 부분은 클릭 이벤트가 발생했을 때 이벤트 객체와 함께 해당 카드의 인덱스를 함수에 전달하게 됩니다.

    그럼에도 불구하고 이 문제가 계속된다면, card 배열이 제대로 정의되었는지, 그리고 그 배열의 각 요소가 postId 속성을 가지고 있는지 확인해보시는 것이 좋을 것 같습니다.

    번역결과

    If the bookmark feature doesn't work, it's probably because the event handler that fires when the bookmark button is clicked isn't working properly. Looking at the error message, an error is occurring saying that the 'postId' property cannot be read. This indicates that card[index] is undefined in card[index].postId.

    To solve this problem, first of all, you need to check the part where the event argument is used in the bookMarkControlHandler function, but the argument is not passed. Also, in the onClick event, you should check if the arguments passed to the event handler are correct.

    We recommend that you try the following modifications:

    javascript
    const bookMarkControlHandler = (event, index) => {
	event.stopPropagation();  // 이벤트 버블링을 방지합니다.
	const newOnScrap = [...onScrap];
	newOnScrap[index] = !newOnScrap[index];
	setOnScrap(newOnScrap);

	mutation.mutate({ id: card[index].postId });
	console.log({ id: card[index].postId });
};

...

<span
	class='css-5dnyrm'
	onClick={(event) => bookMarkControlHandler(event, index)}>
	{onScrap[index] ? <BookMark /> : <BookMarkOn />}
</span>

    In the code above, the event.stopPropagation() method stops the propagation of the event, preventing it from propagating to the parent element. This prevents the bookmark button click event from propagating to the card's click event.

    In the onClick event, we passed event and index as arguments to the bookMarkControlHandler function. This part passes the event object and the index of the corresponding card to the function when the click event occurs.

    If the problem still persists though, you might want to check that the card array is properly defined and that each element of the array has a postId attribute.

    1 / 1
    import profile from "../../imgs/default_profile.png"; import BookMark from "./BookMark"; import BookMarkOn from "./BookMarkOn"; import { useMutation, useQuery, useQueryClient } from "@tanstack/react-query"; import { getBookMarkLists, postBookMarkLists } from "../../api/oha"; import { useState } from "react"; import { styled } from "styled-components"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const CardSmall = ({ card = [], title, subtitle, more, src }) => { const queryClient = useQueryClient(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const mutation = useMutation(postBookMarkLists, { onSuccess: (bookmarkdata) => { queryClient.invalidateQueries(["bookmark"]); }, }); const [onScrap, setOnScrap] = useState(Array(card.length).fill(false)); const bookMarkControlHandler = (event, index) => { event.stopPropagation(); const newOnScrap = [...onScrap]; newOnScrap[index] = !newOnScrap[index]; setOnScrap(newOnScrap); mutation.mutate({ id: card[index].postId }); console.log({ id: card[index].postId }); }; const moveDetailButtonHandler = (id) => { console.log(id); navigate(`/detail/${id}`); }; return ( <> {card && card.map((item, index) => ( <CardSmallItem key={index} onClick={() => moveDetailButtonHandler(item.postId)}> <CardInnerWrap> <CardInnerImageWrap> <CardInnerImageItem src={item.titleImage} /> <CardProfileWrap> <CardProfileContainer> <CardProfileInner> <CardProfileItem src={profile} /> </CardProfileInner> <CardProfileUserName>{item.nickname}</CardProfileUserName> </CardProfileContainer> </CardProfileWrap> <ScrapButtonWrap> <ScrapButtonContainer> <span class='css-5dnyrm' onClick={(event) => bookMarkControlHandler(event, index)}> {onScrap[index] ? <BookMark /> : <BookMarkOn />} </span> </ScrapButtonContainer> </ScrapButtonWrap> </CardInnerImageWrap> <CardInnerLink></CardInnerLink> </CardInnerWrap> </CardSmallItem> ))} </> ); }; export default CardSmall; const CardSmallItem = styled.li` list-style: none; margin: 0 20px 0 0; flex-shrink: 0; scroll-snap-align: start; width: calc((100% - 100px) / 6); /* transform: translateX(${(props) => props.$slidePx}px); transition: 0.5s ease; */ `; const CardInnerWrap = styled.div` position: relative; display: flex; width: 100%; min-width: 0; flex-flow: column; `; const CardInnerImageWrap = styled.div` overflow: hidden; position: relative; border-radius: 4px; height: 230px; justify-content: space-between; `; const CardInnerLink = styled.a` position: absolute; inset: 0; cursor: pointer; `; const CardInnerImageItem = styled.img` width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; transition: transform 0.2s ease 0s; overflow-clip-margin: content-box; overflow: clip; `; const CardProfileWrap = styled.div` position: absolute; padding: 8px; font-size: 0px; z-index: 1; left: 0px; bottom: 0px; `; const CardProfileContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-content: center; margin: 0; padding: 0; `; const CardProfileInner = styled.div` position: relative; width: 24px; height: 24px; border-radius: 100%; overflow: hidden; display: inline-block; margin-right: 4px; `; const CardProfileItem = styled.img` width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); overflow-clip-margin: content-box; overflow: clip; `; const CardProfileUserName = styled.span` overflow: hidden; display: inline-block; max-width: 100px; font-size: 12px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 700; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; `; const ScrapButtonWrap = styled.div` position: absolute; padding: 8px; font-size: 0px; z-index: 1; right: 0px; bottom: 0px; `; const ScrapButtonContainer = styled.div``; 새로 고침 하면 북마크 값이 다시 처음으로 되돌아가고 있어
    1 / 1

    북마크 값이 페이지를 새로 고침할 때마다 초기화되는 문제는 사용자의 상태를 클라이언트 측에서만 관리하고 있기 때문입니다. 상태 관리를 서버 측에서 처리하거나 브라우저의 로컬 스토리지를 이용해 상태를 저장해야 합니다.

    예를 들어, React의 useEffect 훅을 사용하여 컴포넌트가 마운트될 때 이전 상태를 불러올 수 있습니다. 이 방식을 사용하면 페이지를 새로 고침하더라도 이전 상태를 유지할 수 있습니다.

    여기에 예시를 들어 설명하겠습니다:

    jsx
    import { useEffect } from 'react';

// 기존 코드
const [onScrap, setOnScrap] = useState(Array(card.length).fill(false));

useEffect(() => {
  const savedState = localStorage.getItem('onScrap');
  if (savedState) {
    setOnScrap(JSON.parse(savedState));
  }
}, []);

useEffect(() => {
  localStorage.setItem('onScrap', JSON.stringify(onScrap));
}, [onScrap]);

    위의 코드는 onScrap 상태를 브라우저의 로컬 스토리지에 저장하고, 컴포넌트가 마운트될 때 로컬 스토리지에서 상태를 불러오는 방식입니다.

    그러나 이 방법에는 한 가지 문제가 있습니다. 즉, 모든 사용자가 같은 브라우저를 사용하고 있는 것은 아니기 때문에, 로그인 정보나 다른 사용자 정보와 같이 중요한 정보는 이런 방식으로 저장하는 것은 안전하지 않습니다. 따라서 중요한 정보는 서버에 저장하고 필요할 때마다 요청하여 가져오는 방식을 사용해야 합니다.

    또한, 이 방식은 서버와의 동기화 문제를 해결하지 못합니다. 즉, 다른 브라우저나 기기에서 사용자가 동일한 작업을 수행했을 때 그 상태가 이 기기와 동기화되지 않습니다. 이 문제를 해결하려면 서버 측에서 상태 관리를 해야 합니다. 이 경우, 서버에서 북마크 상태를 가져오고 북마크 상태가 변경될 때마다 서버에 업데이트를 요청하는 것이 좋습니다.

    번역결과

    The problem with the bookmark value resetting every time the page is refreshed is that the user's state is only managed on the client side. You should handle state management server-side or use the browser's local storage to store state.

    For example, you can use React's useEffect hook to load a previous state when a component mounts. This way, even if the page is refreshed, the previous state is maintained.

    Here's an example:

    jsx
    import { useEffect } from 'react';

// 기존 코드
const [onScrap, setOnScrap] = useState(Array(card.length).fill(false));

useEffect(() => {
  const savedState = localStorage.getItem('onScrap');
  if (savedState) {
    setOnScrap(JSON.parse(savedState));
  }
}, []);

useEffect(() => {
  localStorage.setItem('onScrap', JSON.stringify(onScrap));
}, [onScrap]);

    The code above saves the onScrap state to the browser's local storage and loads the state from the local storage when the component is mounted.

    However, there is one problem with this method. This means that not all users are using the same browser, so it is not safe to store sensitive information such as login information or other user information this way. Therefore, important information should be stored on the server and requested whenever necessary.

    Also, this approach doesn't solve synchronization issues with the server. This means that when a user performs the same action on another browser or device, their state will not sync with this device. To solve this problem, you need to do state management on the server side. In this case, it is better to get the bookmark status from the server and ask the server to update it whenever the bookmark status changes.

    1 / 1
    해결된 코드를 보여줘
    1 / 1

    네, 상태를 로컬 스토리지에 저장하고 불러오는 방법을 적용한 예제를 작성해드리겠습니다.

    jsx
    import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { useMutation, useQueryClient } from 'react-query';
import { postBookMarkLists } from '../../api/oha';

// 나머지 import들...

const CardSmall = ({ card = [], title, subtitle, more, src }) => {
    const queryClient = useQueryClient();
    const navigate = useNavigate();
    const mutation = useMutation(postBookMarkLists, {
        onSuccess: () => {
            queryClient.invalidateQueries('bookmark');
        },
    });

    // 로컬 스토리지에서 이전 상태를 불러옵니다.
    const [onScrap, setOnScrap] = useState(() => {
        const savedState = localStorage.getItem('onScrap');
        return savedState ? JSON.parse(savedState) : Array(card.length).fill(false);
    });

    // 상태가 변경될 때마다 로컬 스토리지에 저장합니다.
    useEffect(() => {
        localStorage.setItem('onScrap', JSON.stringify(onScrap));
    }, [onScrap]);

    // 나머지 코드들...
};

    이 코드에서 useState에 전달하는 초기화 함수를 사용하여 컴포넌트가 처음 렌더링 될 때 로컬 스토리지에서 이전 상태를 불러옵니다. useEffect 훅을 사용하여 onScrap 상태가 변경될 때마다 이를 로컬 스토리지에 저장합니다.

    이 방법으로 페이지를 새로 고침하더라도 상태를 유지할 수 있습니다. 하지만, 이 방법은 로컬 스토리지를 사용하므로 여러 브라우저나 기기 간의 상태 공유는 불가능합니다. 그리고 보안이 중요한 데이터에 대해서는 사용하지 않는 것이 좋습니다. 이러한 경우에는 서버에서 상태를 관리하는 것이 좋습니다.
